ABS.title: Abstract
ABS.description: Patient demographic and visit information not included in other segments

ACC.title: Accident
ACC.description: Information about a patient's accident or incident

ADD.title: Addendum
ADD.description: Additional information added to a previously sent message

ADJ.title: Adjustment
ADJ.description: Adjustment to charges, credits, and other financial aspects of healthcare

AIG.title: Appointment Information - General Resource
AIG.description: Appointment information shared among systems and applications

AIL.title: Appointment Information - Location Resource
AIL.description: Appointment location-specific information shared among systems and applications

AIP.title: Appointment Information - Personnel Resource
AIP.description: Appointment personnel-specific information shared among systems and applications

AIS.title: Appointment Information - Service Resource
AIS.description: Appointment service-specific information shared among systems and applications

APR.title: Appointment Preferences
APR.description: Appointment preferences of a patient or provider

ARV.title: Appointment Result
ARV.description: Results of an appointment, including wait times and visit duration

AUT.title: Authorization Information
AUT.description: Authorization information for healthcare services or procedures

BHS.title: Batch Header
BHS.description: Header segment for a batch of messages

BLG.title: Billing
BLG.description: Information related to billing for healthcare services

BPO.title: Blood Product Order
BPO.description: Order for blood products and related information

BPX.title: Blood Product Dispense Status
BPX.description: Status information for dispensed blood products

BTS.title: Batch Trailer
BTS.description: Trailer segment for a batch of messages

BTX.title: Blood Product Transfusion/Disposition
BTX.description: Transfusion or disposition of blood product information

BUI.title: Blood Unit Information
BUI.description: Blood unit information including donor and product details

CDM.title: Charge Description Master
CDM.description: Charge description information for healthcare services

CDO.title: Clinical Study Phase/Observation
CDO.description: Clinical study phase or observation information

CER.title: Certificate Detail
CER.description: Details about a certificate used for authentication or encryption

CM1.title: Clinical Study Phase Schedule
CM1.description: Clinical trial phase schedule and order.

CM2.title: Clinical Study Schedule Master
CM2.description: Master plan for clinical trial activities.

CNS.title: Clear Notification
CNS.description: Notify an application to clear data from memory.

CON.title: Consent Segment
CON.description: Patient or subject consent for a procedure or treatment.

CSS.title: Clinical Study Data Schedule Segment
CSS.description: Schedule for clinical study data collection.

DMI.title: DRG Master File Information
DMI.description: DRG (Diagnosis Related Group) Master File Information.

DSC.title: Continuation Pointer
DSC.description: Continuation pointer used in messages with long text fields.

DSP.title: Display Data
DSP.description: Display information for a user interface.

ECD.title: Equipment Command
ECD.description: Instructions on how to operate equipment

ECR.title: Equipment Command Response
ECR.description: Response to an equipment command message

EDU.title: Educational Detail
EDU.description: Details related to patient education provided

EQP.title: Equipment Log Service
EQP.description: Log of equipment usage and maintenance

EQU.title: Equipment Detail
EQU.description: Details of equipment used for a procedure

ERR.title: Error Message
ERR.description: Report of an error encountered during message processing

EVN.title: Event Type
EVN.description: Information about the occurrence of an event

FAC.title: Facility
FAC.description: Identification and location of a healthcare facility

FHS.title: File Header
FHS.description: Header information for a batch of messages

FT1.title: Financial Transaction
FT1.description: Billing information for healthcare services rendered

FTS.title: File Trailer
FTS.description: Trailer information for a batch of messages

GP1.title: Grouping/Reimbursement - Visit
GP1.description: Grouping and reimbursement details for a visit

GP2.title: Grouping/Reimbursement - Procedures
GP2.description: Grouping and reimbursement details for procedures

GT1.title: Guarantor
GT1.description: Information about a patient's financial guarantor

IAM.title: Patient Adverse Reaction Information
IAM.description: Contains patient adverse reaction information for allergy and adverse reaction tracking.

IAR.title: Allergy Reaction
IAR.description: Information about adverse reactions associated with an allergy in a patient's medical record.

IIM.title: Inventory Item Master
IIM.description: Contains information about inventory items, such as description and unit of measure.

ILT.title: Material Lot
ILT.description: Contains information about a lot or batch of a material.

IN1.title: Insurance
IN1.description: Contains information about a patient's insurance policy or coverage.

IN2.title: Insurance Additional Information
IN2.description: Contains additional information about a patient's insurance policy or coverage.

IN3.title: Insurance Additional Information, Certification
IN3.description: Contains additional insurance information, including certification and authorization.

INV.title: Inventory Detail
INV.description: Contains detailed information about inventory items, including quantity on hand and expiration date.

IPC.title: Imaging Procedure Control Segment
IPC.description: Contains information about imaging procedure control, including scheduled and performed procedures.

IPR.title: Invoice Processing Results
IPR.description: Contains information about the results of processing an invoice.

ISD.title: Interaction Status Detail
ISD.description: Contains information about the status of an interaction between healthcare providers.

ITM.title: Material Item
ITM.description: Contains information about a specific material item.

IVC.title: Invoice Segment
IVC.description: Contains information about an invoice or bill.

IVT.title: Material Location
IVT.description: Contains information about a specific material location.

LAN.title: Language Detail
LAN.description: Contains information about a patient's language preference.

LCC.title: Location Charge Code
LCC.description: Contains information about a location's charge codes.

LCH.title: Location Characteristic
LCH.description: Contains information about a location's characteristics, such as availability and accessibility.

LDP.title: Location Department
LDP.description: Contains information about a location's department, such as description and phone number.

LOC.title: Location Identification
LOC.description: Contains information about a location, such as name and address.

LRL.title: Location Relationship
LRL.description: Contains information about the relationship between two locations.

MFA.title: Master File Acknowledgment
MFA.description: Contains acknowledgment information about a master file update.

MFE.title: Master File Entry
MFE.description: Contains information about a master file entry, such as a patient or practitioner.

MFI.title: Master File Identification
MFI.description: Contains identification information about a master file.

MRG.title: Merge Patient Information
MRG.description: Merge multiple patient registrations and demographics data into a single registration.

MSA.title: Message Acknowledgment
MSA.description: Defines the acknowledgment code, message control ID, and text message for a message.

MSH.title: Message Header
MSH.description: Contains the message header information such as sending/receiving application and message type.

NCK.title: System Clock
NCK.description: Specifies the date and time used by the system.

NDS.title: Notification Detail
NDS.description: Contains detailed information about a notification or alert message.

NK1.title: Next of Kin / Associated Parties
NK1.description: Contains information about a patient's next of kin or other associated parties.

NPU.title: Bed Status Update
NPU.description: Indicates a change in the status of a bed or other inpatient location.

NSC.title: Application Status Change
NSC.description: Indicates a change in the status of an HL7 application or system.

NST.title: Application Control Level Statistics
NST.description: Contains statistical information about an HL7 application or system.

NTE.title: Notes and Comments
NTE.description: Contains free text notes or comments related to a particular segment or field.

OBR.title: Observation Request
OBR.description: Contains information about a request for a clinical observation or test.

OBX.title: Observation/Result
OBX.description: Contains observation or test results for a patient or specimen.

ODS.title: Dietary Orders, Supplements, and Preferences
ODS.description: Contains dietary orders, supplements, and preferences for a patient.

ODT.title: Diet Tray Instructions
ODT.description: Contains dietary tray instructions for a patient.

OM1.title: General Segment for an Observation
OM1.description: Contains general observation-related information, such as test codes and specimen source.

OM2.title: Numeric Observation
OM2.description: Contains numeric observation data for a patient or specimen.

OM3.title: Categorical Service/Test/Observation
OM3.description: Contains categorical observation data for a patient or specimen.

OM4.title: Observations that Require Specimens
OM4.description: Contains information about specimens required for a particular test or observation.

OM5.title: Observations that Are Calculated from Other Observations
OM5.description: Contains information about how calculated observations are derived from other observations.

OM6.title: Observations that Are Method-Dependent
OM6.description: Contains information about observations that depend on the method used for the test or observation.

OM7.title: Observation Batteries
OM7.description: Contains information about observation batteries, which group related observations together.

ORC.title: Common Order Segment
ORC.description: Communicates order placement, filling, and/or cancelation.

ORG.title: Prder Group Segment
ORG.description: Groups orders together for easier identification and processing.

OVR.title: Override Segment
OVR.description: Indicates modification or override of specified fields and values.

PAC.title: Packaging Segment
PAC.description: Specifies details about the packaging of medical products or devices.

PCE.title: Patient Charge Cost Center Exceptions
PCE.description: Contains information on patient cost center exceptions to the charge master.

PCR.title: Possible Causal Relationship
PCR.description: Describes a possible cause of a clinical event, such as an adverse reaction.

PD1.title: Patient Additional Demographic
PD1.description: Contains additional demographic information about the patient.

PDA.title: Patient Death and Autopsy
PDA.description: Contains information about the death of a patient and/or results of an autopsy.

PDC.title: Product Detail Country
PDC.description: Identifies countries in which a medical product has been registered.

PEO.title: Product Experience Observation
PEO.description: Contains information about a patient's experience with a medical product.

PES.title: Product Experience Sender
PES.description: Identifies the sender of a message related to a patient's experience with a medical product.

PID.title: Patient Identification
PID.description: Contains demographic and identifying information about a patient.

PKG.title: Packaging
PKG.description: Specifies details about the packaging of a medical product or device.

PMT.title: Payment Information
PMT.description: Contains information about a patient's insurance coverage and payment history.

PR1.title: Procedures
PR1.description: Contains information about procedures performed on a patient.

PRA.title: Practitioner Detail
PRA.description: Contains information about the healthcare provider responsible for the patient's care.

PRB.title: Problem Details
PRB.description: Contains information about a patient's health problems or concerns.

PRC.title: Pricing
PRC.description: Contains pricing and cost information for a medical product or service.

PRD.title: Provider Data
PRD.description: Contains information about a healthcare provider or organization.

PRT.title: Participation Information
PRT.description: Contains information about the participation of a healthcare provider or organization.

PSG.title: Product/Service Group
PSG.description: Groups medical products or services together for easier identification and processing.

PSH.title: Product/Service Header
PSH.description: Contains administrative details about a medical product or service.

PSL.title: Product/service line item
PSL.description: Order details for a single product or service

PSS.title: Product/service section
PSS.description: Details for a group of products or services

PTH.title: Pathway
PTH.description: Information about a planned path or course of treatment

PV1.title: Patient visit
PV1.description: Details about a patient's current visit or admission

PV2.title: Patient visit - additional information
PV2.description: Additional patient visit details such as insurance and referral

PYE.title: Payee Information
PYE.description: Information about the person or entity to receive payment

QAK.title: Query Acknowledgement
QAK.description: Acknowledgement of a query message sent to a receiver

QID.title: Query Definition
QID.description: Definition of a query, including query parameters and values

QPD.title: Query Parameter Definition
QPD.description: Definition of query parameters and values

QRI.title: Query Response Instance
QRI.description: A single instance of a query response

RCP.title: Response Control Parameter
RCP.description: Segment for controlling processing behavior of an associated response message.

RDF.title: Table Row Definition
RDF.description: Segment defining structure of a table in tabular reporting format.

RDT.title: Table Row Data
RDT.description: Segment for transmitting tabular data in tabular reporting format.

REL.title: Clinical Relationship
REL.description: Segment for describing clinical relationships between orders, results, and observations.

RF1.title: Referral Information
RF1.description: Segment for capturing details related to a referral request or transfer.

RFI.title: Referral Information
RFI.description: Segment for capturing details related to a referral request or transfer.

RGS.title: Resource Group
RGS.description: Segment for grouping resources to be scheduled in a single time slot.

RMI.title: Risk Management Incident
RMI.description: Segment for reporting an incident related to patient safety.

ROL.title: Role
ROL.description: Segment for defining a person's or organization's role in an order or other activity.

RQ1.title: Requisition Detail-1
RQ1.description: Segment for additional detail regarding a requisition request for laboratory services.

RQD.title: Requisition Detail
RQD.description: Segment for defining the requested laboratory test and associated specimen information.

RXA.title: Pharmacy/Treatment Administration
RXA.description: Segment for transmitting medication administration record information.

RXC.title: Pharmacy/Treatment Component Order
RXC.description: Segment for describing the order of a medication or treatment component.

RXD.title: Pharmacy/Treatment Dispense
RXD.description: Segment for transmitting dispensed medication or treatment information.

RXE.title: Pharmacy/Treatment Encoded Order
RXE.description: Segment for encoding an order for medication or treatment.

RXG.title: Pharmacy/Treatment Give
RXG.description: Segment for describing the giving of medication or treatment.

RXO.title: Pharmacy/Treatment Order
RXO.description: Segment for transmitting an order for medication or treatment.

RXR.title: Pharmacy/Treatment Route
RXR.description: Segment for describing the route of administration of a medication or treatment.

RXV.title: Pharmacy/Treatment Variables
RXV.description: Segment for specifying values for variables used in a medication or treatment order.

SAC.title: Specimen Container
SAC.description: Information about the container holding the specimen.

SCD.title: Anti-Microbial Cycle Data
SCD.description: Anti-microbial cycle and phase information related to the specimen.

SCH.title: Scheduling Activity Information
SCH.description: Scheduling activity and event timing information.

SGH.title: Segment Group Header
SGH.description: Segment group identification and control information.

SGT.title: Segment Group Trailer
SGT.description: Segment group control information, including message count and checksum.

SHP.title: Shipment
SHP.description: Shipment identification, status, and packing information.

SLT.title: Sterilization Lot
SLT.description: Sterilization lot identification and control information.

SPM.title: Specimen
SPM.description: Specimen source, collection, and transport information.

STF.title: Staff Identification
STF.description: Staff identification, credentials, and employment information.

TQ1.title: Timing/Quantity
TQ1.description: Timing/Quantity information for a medication, observation, or a test.

TQ2.title: Timing/Quantity Relationship
TQ2.description: Timing/Quantity Relationship between orders or result and their related observations.

UB1.title: UB-92 Data
UB1.description: UB-92 Data related to patient's health care insurance claim.

UB2.title: UB92 Data
UB2.description: UB92 Data related to patient's health care insurance claim.

VAR.title: Variance
VAR.description: Variance information for a specified observation or result.
